Package org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.subsystems

Class VisionSubsystem

java.lang.Object
com.arcrobotics.ftclib.command.SubsystemBase
org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.subsystems.VisionSubsystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.arcrobotics.ftclib.command.Subsystem
public class VisionSubsystem extends com.arcrobotics.ftclib.command.SubsystemBase
The VisionSubsystem is responsible for handling all vision-related tasks, including target detection and pose estimation using a Limelight camera.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • VisionSubsystem

      public VisionSubsystem (com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.HardwareMap hardwareMap, com.bylazar.telemetry.TelemetryManager telemetry)
      Constructs a new VisionSubsystem.
      Parameters:
      hardwareMap - The hardware map to retrieve hardware devices from.
      telemetry - The telemetry manager for logging.

  • Method Details

    • getTargetTx

      public Optional<Double> getTargetTx()
      Gets the horizontal offset from the crosshair to the target.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the 'tx' value if a target is present.

    • getTargetTy

      public Optional<Double> getTargetTy()
      Gets the vertical offset from the crosshair to the target.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the 'ty' value if a target is present.

    • getTargetTa

      public Optional<Double> getTargetTa()
      Gets the area of the target in the frame.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the 'ta' value (target area) if a target is present.

    • hasTarget

      public boolean hasTarget()
      Checks if the Limelight has a valid target.
      Returns:
      True if a valid target is detected, false otherwise.

    • getHorizontalDistanceToTarget

      public Optional<Double> getHorizontalDistanceToTarget()
      Calculates the horizontal distance (on the ground) to the target. This is ideal for most interpolations.
      Returns:
      An Optional<Double> containing the distance in meters.

    • getDirectDistanceToTarget

      public Optional<Double> getDirectDistanceToTarget()
      Calculates the direct distance (hypotenuse) from the camera to the target.
      Returns:
      An Optional<Double> containing the distance in meters.

    • updateLimelightYaw

      public void updateLimelightYaw (double yaw)
      Updates the robot's orientation (yaw) in the Limelight. This helps with more accurate pose estimation.
      Parameters:
      yaw - The robot's current yaw in radians.

    • getRobotPose

      public Optional<com.pedropathing.geometry.Pose> getRobotPose (double yaw)
      Gets the robot's pose as estimated by the Limelight using AprilTags.
      Parameters:
      yaw - The robot's current yaw in radians, used to improve the estimate.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the robot's Pose if a target is visible.

    • periodic

      public void periodic()
      This method is called periodically to update the subsystem's state and telemetry.
